Ducati Bakal Tukar Posisi Petrucci dan Miller Tahun Depan?
06 Nov 2019, 11:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gosip mengejutkan datang dari kubu Ducati. Pabrikan yang bermarkas di Borgo Panigale, Bologna, Italia, ini dikabarkan akan menukar posisi Danilo Petrucci dan Jack Miller di MotoGP tahun depan. Demikian yang dilansir Speedweek pada Selasa (5/11/2019).
Usai kepergian Jorge Lorenzo ke Repsol Honda, Petrucci mendapat tempat di Ducati Team musim ini, bertandem dengan sahabatnya sendiri, Andrea Dovizioso. Ia pun tampil impresif pada paruh pertama musim ini, meraih tiga podium, termasuk kemenangan besar di Mugello, Italia.
Sayang, usai finis ketiga di Catalunya, Spanyol, ia justru belum lagi naik podium, bahkan harus susah payah menembus posisi 10 besar dalam sembilan seri terakhir. Situasi ini justru sangat berkebalikan dengan rider Pramac Racing, Jack Miller, yang juga mengendarai Desmosedici GP19 spek pabrikan.

Ducati Will Change Petrucci and Miller's Position Next Year?
Nov 6 2019, 11:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Surprising gossip comes from the Ducati camp. The manufacturer, based in Borgo Panigale, Bologna, Italy, is rumored to be swapping Danilo Petrucci and Jack Miller's positions in MotoGP next year. So that was reported by Speedweek on Tuesday (11/05/2019).
After the departure of Jorge Lorenzo to Repsol Honda, Petrucci won a place at the Ducati Team this season, meeting with his own best friend, Andrea Dovizioso. He also appeared impressive in the first half of the season, winning three podiums, including a big win at Mugello, Italy.
Unfortunately, after finishing third in Catalunya, Spain, he actually hasn't yet climbed the podium, even having to struggle to penetrate the top 10 positions in the last nine series. This situation is exactly the opposite of Pramac Racing rider Jack Miller, who also drives the Desmosedici GP19 manufacturer spec.
